attributes.action: Ban the third party resale of music venue events and make it a criminal offence.
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.viagogo.co.uk/Concert-Tickets/Rock-and-Pop/Ed-Sheeran-Tickets

Ed sheeran tickets. Face value £44-£77. Resale price £150-£450
attributes.background: I want venue event tickets to be sold directly to fans from ticket selling websites.The introduction of the buyers name to be included on the ticket. And valid I.D to be used when accessing the event venue. I want this to stop such websites such as viagogo from reselling tickets at 200% profit.

rejection.details:
This petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/171819
